name: PhishingAttack
description: A case template for handling phishing attack incidents
author: DFIR-IRIS
summary: Investigation and mitigation of a phishing attack

tasks.title: Verify phishing email
tasks.description: Confirm the email is indeed a phishing attempt

tasks.title: Analyze phishing email
tasks.description: Analyze the email headers, content, and any attachments for IOCs

tasks.title: Block sender
tasks.description: Block the sender's email address to prevent further attempts

tasks.title: Notify affected users
tasks.description: Notify affected users about the phishing attack and provide guidance

tasks.title: Update security awareness training
tasks.description: Update security awareness training materials to cover this type of phishing attempt if unknown
